snippet: Rick Nash, the Rangers’ new high-scoring forward, had six days to learn a new system and establish a rapport with his new teammates.
abstract: Rick Nash, former Columbus Blue Jackets forward who was traded to New York Rangers in off-season, will make his Rangers debut in upcoming game against Boston Bruins; Nash, because of lockout, has had only six days to learn new system and establish rapport with his new teammates.
lead_paragraph: Rick Nash, the Rangers’ new high-scoring forward, had six days to learn a new system and establish a rapport with his new teammates.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Rick Nash Is Caught in a Quick Transition
headline.main: Nash Is Caught in a Quick Transition
headline.print_headline: Nash Is Caught in a Quick Transition
